attach

public boolean attach()
Description copied from interface: TbitsObservable
Used when the instance has to be registered in the central event bus or some other similar bus. This method has to be explicitly called to enable it to listen global events.

Specified by:
attach in interface TbitsObservable

detach

public boolean detach()
Description copied from interface: TbitsObservable
Used when the instance has to be de-registered from the central event bus or some other similar bus If TbitsObservable.attach() has been called then this method should be explicitly called to remove its instance for global registry. Otherwise it may lead to memory leaks

Specified by:
detach in interface TbitsObservable
